text: Marriage Italian Style is a 1964 movie. The movie is about a cynical business man who goes through an on-off relationship. Marcello Mastroianni plays Domenico. Sophia Loren plays Filomena. This movie was nominated for two Academy Awards. In 1965, Sophia Loren was nominated for Best Actress in a Leading Role. In 1966, the movie was nominated for Best Foreign Language Film. == Other websites == * Category:Italian-language movies Category:1964 movies Category:Italian movies Category:Movies directed by Vittorio De Sica
title: Marriage Italian Style
